context: Commodore IEC Serial Bus Protocol Reference

splits.name: iec_bus_overview_electrical
splits.description: IEC bus overview, IEEE-488 origins, signal lines (SRQ/ATN/CLK/DATA/RESET), open collector logic, PET parallel bus background, daisy-chain design

splits.name: iec_bus_byte_transfer_arbitration
splits.description: IEC byte transfer protocol - CLK/DATA handshaking, timing (60us hold), EOI signaling, ATN command transmission, TALK/LISTEN arbitration, secondary addressing, KERNAL API routines for serial bus

splits.name: iec_bus_commodore_dos_programming
splits.description: Commodore DOS layer - channels 0-15, command channel 15, file types (SEQ/PRG/USR/REL), directory listing, status codes, block access API (U1/U2/B-A/B-F), BASIC and assembly programming patterns for disk I/O
